channel.title: Design on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in Design on My New Hugo Site

item.title: Bookstore wins a hubbie
item.description: Almost a year ago now the BCIT Bookstore let Web Services know that the e-commerce application they used to manage their online sales was upgrading and asked if we’d like to help skin the new site. The department was pretty busy at the time and my manager said we didn’t have time to help out but put them in contact with me so I could direct them to the style guide and technical guidelines.

item.title: Missing table based layouts.
item.description: There’s only one time where I ever really miss table based layouts: when I’m trying to make a flexible horizontal navigation bar with centred links. Like this or this. chews on keyboard with frustration

item.title: These are a few of my favourite things
item.description: Comics and web design together at last!
